attributes.action: I wish the new Dog law to go back to parliament to be reconsidered
attributes.additional_details: Loads of breeders are complaining asking I wish there was a petition we could sign so having a go at doing one
attributes.background: The new licensing law to sell puppies has hit very hard on the breeders that actually care for the breed and only doing the one to two litters a year these people should not be included in the new licensing law.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what law you are referring to.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to repeal this law if that is something you would like to see happen:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/animal-welfare-boosted-by-new-law-coming-into-force
